bike.description: A1 Premium Aluminum, double-butted ORE DT, forged HT/ISCG BB/chainstay yoke/horizontal dropouts, integrated chain tensioner and axle carrier, replaceable 98954020 alloy hanger, disc only

32A w/ ISCG mounted E.13 "32 Special" chain guide
